Both Ash and Pikachu are getting fatter
Ash and Pikachu find strange fruit
1.content: Why will Pikachu become fat?
1.title: Starting out!

choices: Feeding Pikachu Slob Berries, which he had bought on his latest travels
Gorging on fattening food with Pikachu
Putting Pikachu in a feeding machine
11.content: After conquering all the Pokémon leagues, Ash had returned home to relax for a while before embarking on his next adventure. He also had another motive though, one he hadn't told anyone about. He liked his Pikachu, but for a long time had thought that the little electric mouse was way too thin and he now wanted to change that. He was going to do this by...
11.title: Ash thinks that Pikachu is too thin

choices: Pikachu wakes up during the night
With Pikachu asleep, Ash does something in secret
111.content:
Ash came home from nearby Pokéburger carrying two large bags full of greasy food. He entered his room, where Pikachu was sleeping, set the bags on a table and started taking food out them. Pikachu woke up to the sound of rustling wrappers and walked up to his trainer, curious about what was going on. Ash noticed this and greeted his Chu "Hi there, Pikachu! Are you hungry? I brought you some food." He unwrapped a super large cheeseburger and gave it to Pikachu, who started munching on it after curiously examining it. It was completely different from the usual Poké chow Ash fed him. Ash watched smiling and gave Pikachu a huge glass of cola. "Here. You can wash it down with this." Pikachu happily did so and was soon finished with the burger. Ash smiled at his hungry friend again, dug into the bags and said "Did you like it? There's plenty more for you, buddy." Ash handed another steaming burger to Pikachu, who replied with a happy "Pika!" and chowed down.

After a while, Pikachu had miraculously managed to eat almost all of the food Ash had bought and was now lying on his back, his belly bloated to the point of almost bursting. Ash offered him one last burger, but got only a tired "Urp... 'kachu." in response. Ash chuckled a bit, patted Pikachu's belly and said "I guess you're completely satiated now. Fine, I'll just eat this last one myself. You can rest now." He still filled his bloated friend a bowl of chips in case he got peckish later on, before sitting down to enjoy his own burger. Pikachu just lied there and wondered why his trainer suddenly gave him so much delicious food before dozing off.
111.title: Just feeding Pikachu fattening food

1111.content:
Pikachu woke up hungrier than ever. Since Pikachus digest food really quickly, he had already digested all the burgers Ash fed him the day before and now his stretched stomach was begging to be refilled. He checked the bowl of chips Ash had left him, but found it empty, remembering that he woke up in the middle of night feeling a little peckish and already ate all the chips then. The delicious smell coming from the kitchen didn't help Pikachu's hunger, so he decided to go investigate the source of it. Turned out it was Ash frying pancakes for his famished friend. "Oh, you're already awake?" Ash asked with a smile. "I've been making you breakfast." Ash then picked up Pikachu and placed him on the table, noticing his newly-grown double chin and giving it a playful squeeze, saying "Looks like you're already growing extra chins. Cute!" Next Ash piled a towering stack of pancakes in front of Pikachu and drenched them with a generous helping of syrup. "Dig in!" Ash commanded and Pikachu was more than happy to oblige. It didn't take long for the hungry rodent to eat the entire stack of pancakes, but he still found himself hungry. Fortunately Ash was making more pancakes as fast as Pikachu could eat them, so there was a steady supply of them. Ash was all smiles the whole time, happy about seeing his friend get bigger.

Eventually Pikachu found himself getting full and once more lied on his back, letting out a little belch. He was even more stuffed than the day before, prompting Ash to rub his bloated belly, which both of them enjoyed immensely. "I'm glad you liked the pancakes, buddy." Ash said "Later today I'm going to..."
1111.title: Next morning

11111.content:
pikachu gave a sluggish and docile "pika" as Ash rubbed his heavily bloated stomach. the electric mouse's gut was packed with food as he enjoyed the pleasure building up.
where will go from here?
11111.title: "...make you even more food."

11112.content:
"I think its time we took you to a special club" ash asked, "a sumo club"

Pikachu had no clue what sumo was but was happy to go. they arrived and went to registration. the requirements were only to own a pokemon far heavier than it should be. pikachu passed with flying colors and was given a strange clothe. ash explained it was a mawashi, it went around his waist and between his legs.

after Pikachu put it on they looked around and decided
11112.title: "...take you to a sumo club."

choices: ...he found more of the burgers on the counter.
1112.content:
Pikachu's eyes opened as he heard a low rumbling sound. His eyes opened wide as he realized it was his stomach. He was hungry and for good reason, he had been asleep for several hours. Looking around he saw he must've slept past dinner and dessert as the sky was completely dark and Ash was in bed. It was then Pikachu recalled the bowl of chips. He picked up the bowl and brought it out of the room so he wouldn't disturb Ash.

When he felt he was far enough away so he wouldn't disturb anyone, Pikachu eyed the chips. It was another food that was not part of his normal diet, but figured if it was anything like the burgers it had to be good. He bit into one and instantly began hooked. He ate them down by the handful finding the grease and salted chips to be quite addictive. So much, in fact that before he knew it he had munched down every last crumb. Still, it was not enough. He wanted more to eat so he decided to see what was in the kitchen.

He walked down the stairs on all fours, feeling his belly felt a little bigger than normal. He figured it must've been the burgers. He knew that a sudden change in diet normally caused a Pokemon to gain weight and he figured those burgers were no exception.

As Pikachu entered the kitchen...
1112.title: Late Night Snack

11122.content:
The hungry rodent was rummaging through the pantries in no time. At first, he didn't find anything of interest, just different cooking ingredients, and was feeling hungrier every moment. Just as Pikachu was about to give up, he found a box of sugary breakfast cereal. He remembered seeing Ash eat it, so he decided to give it a curious sniff and taste, finding the taste very nice, especially compared to the Poké chow he was usually fed. Since the box wasn't full, it didn't take long for Pikachu to empty it.

His hunger still not completely satiated, he continued searching the pantries. This time he got lucky and found a big box of chocolate chip cookies. He tore the box open and stuck a paw in, pulling out a big, delicious-smelling cookie. He first gave it a deep sniff and then a big bite, savoring the sweet taste. He ate the cookie in no time and dug in the box again, eating more and more cookies until the box was completely empty.

Pikachu patted his growing belly, enjoying the full feeling. Still, he wondered if he should have a little extra snack on top of all that, since he had found so many pleasant new flavours that night and was having such great fun stuffing himself.
11122.title: ...searched the pantries for food.

111222.content:
Pikachu's taste buds were having a party and couldn't wait for what was going to come next. Pikachu looked around before his eyes locked onto the fridge. To a person it was a place to keep food cold, but to Pikachu it some place nice to rest by on a hot day. He moved closer to it and tried to pry it open, but despite being unlocked he couldn't managed to budge it. This only increased his determination. he looked around for something to help him when he saw the broom resting against the wall. He carried it to the fridge and placed it through the handle. He then pushed against it to help him pry the door open.

As he door opened light was emitted before Pikachu making the sight before him even more wonderous. Pikachu's mouth opened wide seeing it packed full of food. The cold air felt nice against his fur and he searched the items on the first shelf. He found a box of chocolate donuts and removed it from the fridge. He found it wasn't even opened giving himself a dozen donuts to eat. He gave the first one a few experimental bites before he started stuffing his mouth full of them, coating his mouth all over with chocolate. After his third he grew thirsty and climbed the shelves to the top where the milk was and cautiously brought it down. He was glad it was only half full or he'd have never been able to bring it down. He then held uncapped it and held it over his head as he let it flow into his mouth and down his throat. After three big gulps he returns to the donuts and scarfs some more down chasing them with more milk. He repeated this process this he finished them both off and his belly wobbled from all the food. Pikachu let out a belch that made him pause for a moment thinking he might wake somebody up, but he soon found his worry was for nothing. With that he returned to the fridge. He searched for the next think he'd add to his growing gut when he spotted...
111222.title: The Big Cold Wonder

1112222.content: A large wheel of cheese caught Pikachu's gaze and immediately made his mouth water. With some effort, he pulled it out of the fridge and sat down on his widened rear, admiring the yellow, delicious treat. It was completely untouched, Ash had probably just purchased it with Pikachu in mind. Next, Pikachu closed his eyes and took a deep whiff of the wheel, savoring the moment, before biting into it. The rich, creamy taste hit his taste buds, making him moan in delight. Starting with small nibbles, Pikachu soon found himself biting out bigger and bigger chunks. His mouth was full of the tasty cheese which he munched with contented bliss, losing any track of time and, before he knew it, nothing but a small piece was left. Pikachu picked it up, leaned backwards and threw final bit of cheese in his mouth. As he swallowed it, he noticed how much his belly was bulging. It had positively ballooned thanks to all the food he had been filling it with and was finally getting rather full. Pikachu wondered if he should go back to sleep or if he should have one more little snack.
1112222.title: ...cheese.  Mice love cheese.

choices: Pikachu awakes to find Ash giving him breakfast in bed.
Pikachu awakens to the smell of food downstairs.
11122221.content:
Pikachu pondered eating more, but the points of his belly already plenty full and he didn't want to be a Pigachu and raid Ash's home of food, Ash's thoughts on his waistline still unknown to him. With his hands he held his large gut and brought himself to his feet. He then waddled to the door and pushed at it with his rear, feeling just how much larger it had become as it pressed against the door.

When it closed with a "click" he let out a yawn and rubbed his eyes causing his belly to plop down and cause him to tumble forward till he bumped into the wall. He laid in a daze for a moment before he got up again and actually took a good look at his body. It was certainly a good deal pudgier than he or any other Pikachu should have been. Even when food was abundant Pikachu didn't have an appetite one might expect from a Munchlax and Pikachu himself didn't consider him an exception to the rule, at least until now. He recounted all the food he ate and noted it was completely off from his usual diet, not to mention a lot more delicious and addictive. Just thinking about it made Pikachu drool a bit. He was lost in his fantasy of all the foods he got to taste that he almost dozed off in the kitchen, but he snapped out of it and returned his focus to getting up to Ash's room. The stairs proved a lot harder going up now, but it only slowed him down a bit. At the top he quietly made his way to Ash's room and made it to his spot on the bed and curled into a ball, noticing his newly formed fat acted like an extra comfy pillow. He smiled figuring if Ash wanted him to eat more and change his diet why should he complain? He was liking the extra pudge. Just as he was about to sleep he turned to Ash, thinking he was looking at him, but he was still sound asleep. As Pikachu slept, visions of all the goodies he wanted to eat tomorrow swirled in his head.
11122221.title: Sleepy time

111222211.content:
After a pleasant night of dreams filled with food, Pikachu woke up as a delicious scent tickled his nostrils. He opened his eyes and was greeted by Ash entering the room carrying a tray of pancakes. "Good morning, Pikachu." Ash said with a smile and placed the tray in front of his friend "I already made you some breakfast. Bite in!" Pikachu eagerly did so as, thanks to his little night time adventure, he had slept until noon and was getting quite peckish. The pancakes were absolutely drenched in syrup, with a large slab of butter on top, and tasted wonderful as Pikachu soon discovered. Ash just smiled as he watched Pikachu fill his belly. "I noticed that someone had raided the kitchen last night." Ash remarked "Don't worry, I'm not upset. Wouldn't want you to starve, buddy. You could've just woken me up though, I wouldn't mind fixing you up a little late night snack." he continued with a smile.

Soon enough, Pikachu had eaten all the pancakes and was lying on his back, satiated, as Ash rubbed his belly. "You're getting pudgier." Ash noted and playfully pinched Pikachu's newly-developed fat roll "...and all the more cuter. I think we can skip training today, don't you think? You can just rest here. Unless you're still hungry..."
111222211.title: Pikachu awakes to find Ash giving him breakfast...

choices: ...they arrived in the kitchen where Ash has already prepared a large feast.
...Ash led them outside so their could eat in town today.
1112222112.content:
He answered as with an energetic "Pika!" as he jumped to his feet causing this pudgy body to jiggle a bit. Pikachu was never one to pass up on more food and this recent change of menu had already started a desire for larger portions that was undeniably bordering on addiction.

Ash just saw it as another opportunity to help fill out his "little buddy's" figure and he told him that by picking him up and giving him a pat on the back. Pikachu let out a cute little burp as a result and blushed a little.

"If it's more food you want," stated Ash. "Then have I got a treat for you."

With those words, Ash carried Pikachu out the room and down the stairs. Pikachu was already licking his chops at the thought of what was to come. He had some many ideas of what he would like from food he had just discovered to others he seen Ash eat on their journeys, but nothing of the old cuisine he used to eat. As they got downstairs...
1112222112.title: From Breakfast to Lunch

11122221122.content:
Downstairs, Ash handed Pikachu a chocolate chip cookie to gnaw on while he put on his coat, shoes and hat. As he finished dressing up, he noticed that Pikachu had already devoured the cookie, looking no less satiated than before, perhaps even less so. "Hehe. Let's go get something to eat." he said as he opened the door and let Pikachu waddle out. They walked a short distance, which took a bit longer than usual as Pikachu couldn't walk as fast as he normally did due to his increased weight.

Eventually, Ash and his not so little buddy arrived at a...
11122221122.title: ...Ash led them outside so their could eat in t...

choices: Pikachu is stuffed after finishing the pizza.
Pikachu eats the pizza, but he isn't satisfied yet.
111222211222.content:
As the two of them made their way to the building, Pikachu's belly rumbled in response to the smells floating in the air. A bit of drool dripped down his chin as he waddled a little faster to get inside. "Been a while since we went out for pizza so I figure this would be a nice treat," commented Ash as they got in line behind a couple of other customers.

The wait was pretty excruciating for Pikachu who was tormented by the smells. In order to cope, he watched the Pokemon workers helping out. There was a duo or Machops kneading the dough and getting it in shape. There was also a few fire type pokemon that that worked to cook the pizzas in the oven. He watched them work and before he knew it, it was their turn to order.

"What would you like today, sir?" asked the girl at the register.

"What do you think buddy?" asked Ash to Pikachu. "Will a small pizza be enough?"

"Pi pika pi!" Pikachu answered holding his arms to make a circle.

"Oh, a medium then," replied Ash.

"Pi! Pi pika pi!" cried Pikachu straining to making a bigger circle with his arms.

"Oh, a large," chuckled Ash a bit surprised as well. "They make pretty large pizzas here and we're the only two here, but I guess it would be good to have leftovers. Alright then."

Ash made the order and a few minutes after they took their seats a large plain pizza that covered their table was placed before them pre-cut into slices of pizza as big as Pikachu's head and a couple dozen in total.

"Pika pika pi!" drooled Pikachu, his eyes as big as the pizza itself not to mention a bit of greed to eat the entire thing himself.

"Sounds like you're excited to pig out," joked Ash taking a slice for himself. "Well help yourself to as much as you'd like."

Pikachu didn't need to be told that. He took the first piece dripping with gooey cheese and grease and took his first bite. He took one bite and started chewing it down hungrily. He planned to take Ash up on his offer and eat till he couldn't stomach another bite.
111222211222.title: Pizzachu

choices: Delia(ash's mom) Coming to see what noise she heard.
Ash coming to get a drink of water
11123.content: Pikachu was about to open the fridge, when he heard footsteps coming from upstairs. He ran and hid under the sink. He then looked over and saw...
11123.title: ...heard someone coming down the stairs.

111232.content:
He saw Ash.
Ash: *turns the light on, walks over to the sink, gets a glass, walks over to the fridge and gets a drink of water. Looks over to the sink and sees pikachu* Hey buddy. *picks pikachu up and cuddles him*
Pikachu: (happy)Pika!
Ash: Why are you down here? You hungry?
Pikachu: Pika*nods*
Ash: Well I'll make ya a big breakfast in the morning, k?
Pikachu: Pika*nods*
What next?
111232.title: Ash coming to get a drink of water

113.content: how will they do it?
113.title: Gorging on fattening food with Pikachu

choices: Asking pikachu to get fat by drinking from the hose (he agrees)
115.title: Other

choices: They eventually come across a Pokemon Center.
They trespass into a large Pokemon's territory.
They encounter a group of friendly Pokemon.
12.content:
Pikachu's stomach growled as he wearily clung to Ash's shoulder. His trainer had once again started another journey and as per usual left all his other Pokemon, save for Pikachu, at Professor Oak's Lab so he could work to train a new team of Pokemon. Unfortunately, Ash had little luck in the first few weeks they arrived. Ash had yet to capture any Pokemon and to make matters worse they were lost and hungry.

Pikachu had hoped that Ash would find some more human companions to travel with him, but they had yet to see a tomboyish girl on a bicycle or Brock suddenly showing up out of the blue. As much as Pikachu knew Ash would take care of him he knew that Ash wasn't the most capable when it came to things like cooking and Pokemon care. That and the fact that a group of three can carry more supplies than one also made a difference considering how long it could be before they find another Pokemon center.

As Pikachu's stomach grumbled again Ash decided to stop so they could have lunch. He went into his pack and poured Pikachu what was left inside a can of Pokemon Food into Pikachu's bowl, but it was only enough to fill half his bowl. Out of worry for his friend, Ash took his last sandwich he had for himself and gave half to Pikachu as well. Not wanting to be ungrateful and just from sheer hungry Pikachu hopped of Ash's shoulder and gobbled down all his food in no time at all.

Pikachu gave a slight burp, happy that his stomach wasn't starving, but it was hardly enough to fill him up. He looked around the trees for some berries, but they had little luck fighting any let alone one that wasn't already taken by a group of Pokemon that weren't eager to share. As Pikachu waited for Ash to finish eating he couldn't help imagining tons and tons of food to eat. He didn't care if he got a little pudgy, he didn't even care if he ended up so obese he couldn't walk; the delight of being able to feel stuffed never sounded so appealing to him, but he shook such thoughts from his head. He would have liked for his dream to come true, but for now he figured thinking about food would only make him hungry again.

"Come on Pikachu," said Ash walking up to his friend. "Time to get going." Pikachu climbed up on his trainer's shoulder and they were off.
12.title: The Start of Another Journey

choices: Pikachu decides to register himself as a Munchlax.
Pikachu decides to see if he can get away registering himself as a Snorlax.
121.content:
Ash and Pikachu soon came upon a building at the edge of the woods. They recognized the giant pokeball on it representing it as a Pokemon Center. Not wasting a moment, Ash ran inside and up to the Nurse Joy inside.

"Hello there," she said. "How may I help you?"

"Can you please take care of my Pikachu," he asked. "It's been a while since we've been to a Pokemon Center. I think if nothing else, a good meal tonight would help."

As Ash handed Pikachu to Nurse Joy she replied. "Don't worry. He'll be taken care of."

With that, Ash went to get himself something to eat and talk to some of the other trainers resting. Nurse Joy brought Pikachu in the back and did the usual tests to make sure he was health. "Everything looks normal," she told Pikachu. "You just need some food and a little rest and you'll be right as rain. She walked over to the computer and input it into the computer to add Pikachu to the list of Pokemon that need to be fed for dinner. No sooner had she done it another trainer rushed in.

"Nurse Joy!" he cried cradling his Pokemon in his arms. "My Skitty isn't feeling well."

She felt the little Pokemon's forehead and answered. "Looks like it's got a fever. Come with me into the next room and we'll make it feel all better."

As they left Pikachu patted its stomach, feeling hungry again and recalling his earlier desires to eat as much food as he could. He knew such a thing wouldn't happen at the Pokemon Center since they made sure to keep all the Pokemon on a balanced diet. He saw how they input how much food each Pokemon would need on the computer. He saw other Nurse Joys use it during past checkups. It was then he noticed that after getting distracted by that other trainer, Nurse Joy had forgot to submit Pikachu's information into the system.

He made his way over and took a look. All the information was present, but it just wasn't submitted, meaning Pikachu could change it by himself, he did see it done in the past. It was a touch screen and all one needed to do was go through a list of Pokemon to indicate how much food they required. Looking at the results for a Pikachu, it was only a single bowl. Pikachu felt he could eat more than that and decided to test some other Pokemon out. He started with a Snorlax and his eyes opened wide as it would be given a ton of food all to itself. Naturally, Pikachu figured he couldn't get away with something like that. It was too noticeable and they'd change it. He tried a Munchlax and found they get ten bowls of Pokemon food. That sounded more acceptable, but the list had a lot of other Pokemon in it too.
121.title: The Pokemon Center

1212.content: Pikachu registers himself as a Snorlax. Does he get away with it?
1212.title: Tons of food?

12121.content: Pikachu get away with it and then a little while later nurse Joy comes in to give the (snot lay) its food

ash agrees to help, but on one condition...

Pikachu typed in snorlax, and eagerly hoped it would worked. sadly it registered as "denied" he was upset. just then a machamp walked over to him and saw what he was doing
he chuckled and explained that if a pokemon enters it, they can only enter their own kind due to a fingerprint scanner. meaning Pikachu could only register himself. machamp chuckled and made a deal with Pikachu. if ash pretended to be his trainer machamp would get lots of food for them. Pikachu looked it up and saw machamp got 12 bowls of food. after machamp entered himself and ordered a helping of 12. machamp and Pikachu then talked and machamp explained he only pretends to have a trainer to get food here. but he is looking for a good trainer.

Pikachu smiled as ash returned ash stares and machamp as he seemed to understand it wanted to join his team

they continue on. their stomachs growling with hunger in an hour. they sigh and look around hopefully. then they notice they haven't seen any pokemon in a while...

suddenly they hear a rustle in the bushes. Pikachu sparks his cheeks ready to defend his trainer if need be. they starred and gulped as out stepped a humungous

After Ash and Pikachu become Pokemon masters they are treated to huge feasts

13.content: How will they become fat?
13.title: Both Ash and Pikachu are getting fatter

choices: The pair decide to stay at Delia's for a while
Pikachu and Ash leave with full bellies
131.content:
"Oh Ash!" Delia said happily, "I'm so glad that you're back home." The tall milf said happily as her son took a seat at the dinner table while Pikachu hopped up onto a chair next to him. "You two really had me worried to death you know! You should call or visit more!" She said sternly, placing down huge plates of food in front of Ash and Pikachu.
"O-okay mum I know I'm sorry." Ash said hesitantly, a little shocked by the amount of food his mum had cooked him. "You've gone a little overboard with dinner though, unless we're having guests that is."
"No, but you two look so skinny!" Delia called as she walked back into the kitchen, going back to preparing food. "You two musn't get much good food while you're travelling around so I thought this would be a good opportunity to get you a proper home cooked meal!"
Before Ash could say anything to try and get away from his mum, his stomach let out a loud grumbles, as did Pikachu's.
"I guess it has been a while since we had decent food hey buddy." He said to his constant companion, looking at the delicious food in front of him.
"Pika!" The yellow pokemon agreed before diving into the food without a further worry.
"Alright then." He said with a resigned sigh, although the boys resignation quickly turned to awe as he tasted the food and found it to be far more delicious than anything else he'd ever eaten.
"Mmph!" He moaned happily, quickly gulping down the mouthful and going for another. "Mum! This foods amazing!" He managed to call out between subsequent mouthfuls.
"Pika-pi!" Pikachu agreed loudly between mouthfuls of his own.
Delia let out a delighted laugh as she walked back into the dining room, carrying two more plates of food for when the hungry pair finished their first. "I'm glad you two are enjoying it, I didn't have much time to prepare because you just showed up rather than giving me any warning!" She said pointedly at Ash as she placed the second round of plates down.
"Shorry mum~" Ash managed to say with a full mouth, spraying crumbs across the table.
Delia simply laughed again, happy to have her son home. "Don't worry about it, just enjoy your food~" She said, quickly striding back into the kitchen to continue cooking.

The following hour passed in a flash for Pikachu and Ash, the two travellers caught up in eating every plate of food Delia put in front of them, their usual limits obliterated by their hunger and the delicious taste of Delia's cooking.
Finally, the plates stopped, and Pikachu and Ash finished off their sixth plate and lay back in their chairs, their stuffed tummies sticking out.
"Sorry dears, I would love to give you more but I've run out of food, I don't keep much around here for just myself." Delia apologised, a truly sad look on her face.
"Don't *URP* worry mum, I *URP* couldn't each much more *URP* anyway." Ash said, slowly rubbing her bloated tummy as his eyes drooped low.
"Well I promise to have more for breakfast tomorrow. Now you two had better get to bed, I'll clean up."
"Pika." Pikachu managed to wheeze, it's usual energy buried under the pounds of food it'd eaten.
Pikachu and Ash managed to get out of their chairs and waddled their way up to Ash's room, both mindful of their heavy bodies.
"Gosh Pikachu, it's good to be home." Ash sighed as he stripped down to his undies and collapsed on his old bed, curling up around his stomach.
"Pika pi." Pikachu replied, flopping down onto a cushion on the floor in a similar state. The little pokemon had loved his first real taste of Delia's cooking, and was already thinking about the delicious things he would get to eat tomorrow.
"Goodnight Pikachu." Ash called as his eyes closed and his mind began to drift off, helped along by the warm food sitting in his stomach.
"Pi." Was all Pikachu could muster before doing the same, both of their dreams full of warm, filling food.
131.title: Food Made With Love Tastes Best

info.brief_description: Let's make Ash's Pikachu into a ball of lard!
info.description: This is an interactive about fattening up Ash's Pikachu. You may make him as fat as you please and use any methods you want. Or even make him into a disgusting slob if you will. Ash or Gary can be fattened up too, but this should be primarily about Pikachu.
